授業目的:
This course aims to:
1. Develop basic understanding of various topics in business administration and economics
2. Develop an understanding of the impact of changing social, economic, technological and organizational topics
3. Prepare students to evaluate and apply certain theories of social science disciplines to workplace issues
4. Develop students’ ability to analyze and critically evaluate contemporary business issues

授業方法:
On completion of this course students should be able to:
1. Effectively choose key interests in business and economics topics
2. Examine current issues, trends, practices, and processes in in business and Economics
3. Be able to face contemporary business challenges
